verses.name: Joshua 10:7
verses.text: So Joshua ascended from Gilgal, he, and all the people of war with him, and all the mighty men of valour.

verses.name: Joshua 10:8
verses.text: And the Lord said unto Joshua, Fear them not: for I have delivered them into thine hand; there shall not a man of them stand before thee.

verses.name: Joshua 10:9
verses.text: Joshua therefore came unto them suddenly, and went up from Gilgal all night.

verses.name: Joshua 10:10
verses.text: And the Lord discomfited them before Israel, and slew them with a great slaughter at Gibeon, and chased them along the way that goeth up to Beth–horon, and smote them to Azekah, and unto Makkedah.
